description:
Willibald Joachim von Merkatz is the high admiral under kaiser http://anidb.net/ch206 [Freidrich IV] who took refuge with http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang] at http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn] after the Lippschadt war. He was later forced into becoming the space fleet commander-in-chief of the Goldenbaum government in exile.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Willibald Joachim von Merkatz
